326 = Number of Flex applications in the Flex.org Showcase. Many Flex applications either require authentication or are behind firewalls. However the Flex.org Showcase lists publicly available Flex applications. If your Flex application is not listed, go add it today! That's 326 more reasons you can Count on Flex! "Count on Flex" is a series of blogs about the current state of the Flex ecosystem... by the numbers.
